statements: DELETE FROM email_tracking WHERE open_rate > 0.5 AND click_through_rate < 0.3;
DELETE FROM email_tracking WHERE timestamp <= '2022-01-01' AND email_id IN (1, 3, 5);
DELETE FROM email_open_rates WHERE email_id = 5 AND user_id = 10;
DELETE FROM email_click_through_rates WHERE user_id = 15 AND click_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM email_click_through_rates WHERE click_id = 100 AND recipient_email = 'example1@gmail.com';
DELETE FROM email_open_rates WHERE campaign_id = 500 AND open_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM open_rates WHERE email_id = 1 AND user_id = 100;
DELETE FROM email_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 5 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM email_recipients WHERE name = 'John Doe';
